titleStmt.title: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 19: Prayer against the Tongue (Ləsanä Säb'ə)

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

msIdentifier.idno: Princeton Ethiopic Manuscript No. 19: Prayer against the Tongue (Ləsanä Säb'ə)

summary.p: Illustration: Three crosses, each taking up a page.
Owner's name Gäbrä Mäsqäl Zälälä listed near the beginning of the manuscript.
References: See S. Grebaut, " L'hymne-invocation lesana sab'e," Aethiopica 3 (1935): 6-12; Chaîne, "Répertoire," no. 314; Encyclopedia Aethiopica, vol. 3, 553-554.
